description: The Governing Board provides high-level oversight to the Committee to End Homelessness. It is made up of more than 20 top level community leaders and two individuals who have experienced homelessness. The Governing Board helps  sustain the vision and leadership of the plan, and guides planning, coordinates current funding, and works to create additional resources.
